spaceshooter.dom

Class Projectile

  • java.lang.Object
    • spaceshooter.dom.GameObject
      • spaceshooter.dom.ImageObject
        • spaceshooter.dom.Projectile

  • public class Projectile
extends ImageObject
    Object that can be fired with a weapon. This object can iflict damage on other objects it collides with.

        w - width.
